entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Elliot Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 16 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Periods of light snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022
